event_type.Description: Types of events that comprise a trial

HED.cue: Event/Category/Initial context, Event/Label/Cue, Event/Description/An auditory cue was played for 500ms, Sensory presentation/Auditory/Human voice, Participant/Effect/Cognitive/Cue
HED.stimulus: Event/Category/Experimental stimulus, Event/Label/Stimulus, Event/Description/Two Gabor patches were presented on screen for 100ms, Participant/Effect/Cognitive/Target, Sensory presentation/Visual/Rendering type/Screen/2D)
HED.response: Event/Category/Participant response, Event/Label/Response, Event/Description/The participant presses up or down as soon as the target is visible, Action/Button press/Keyboard
HED.missing_arm: Event/Category/Experimental stimulus, Event/Label/MissingArm, Event/Description/A fixation with missing arm is presented, Sensory presentation/Visual
